pluginInfo.tool-description: IBM DataPower is a network security appliance. This plugin assists in deploying services to DataPower appliances.

release-notes.release-note: Fix issue #1 - set ANT_HOME to plugin's version of Ant.
Move xalan to apache-ant/lib, use current version of ant (1.9.7).
New functionality added to all steps: - The ANT_OPTS variable is applied to all commands. - Specify the hidden Java Max Memory Size variable to increase the Ant commands JVM size.
New functionality added to all steps: - The hidden Java Max Memory Size variable has new -Xmx4096m, ${p?:environment/memorySize}, and ${p?:resource/memorySize} options.

Fixes APAR PI79894 - New functionality added to the Import (Basic), Import (Definition), and Import (Deployment Policy Object) steps: - The hidden Import Error Regex variable can be utilized to ignore SOMA error responses.
DataPower plugin is now bundled with Ant v1.9.9.

Fixes APAR PI85141 - Failure in Export Object step due to missing all.files default argument. The Export Object step contains a new Export All Files? property and all required properties are now properly marked. Fixes APAR PI84786 - Escape all special characters (except double quotes) in Password field for Windows OS.
Improve Invoke any deploy.ant.xml target step's Additional Properties decription. Property names and values are now trimmed.

Issue #81 - Added format argument to the export-object and export-objects DCM targets to define export type. Possible values: XML or ZIP. Default is ZIP. Issue #82 - Added missing port property in the importConfig and importConfigDPO macrodefs used by import-from-def and import-dpo DCM tasks. PR #85 - Set SSLClientProfile for Load Balancer Groups and update health check comments to include TCPConnectionType check.
Fixes APAR PI92154 - Missing default format property value in export-object and export-objects targets.

PR #87 - New key-create target to generate a private key, a public key, and a self-signed certificate. - Updated the default spelling of the ref.files property in password-alias-create and password-alias-update targets.
RFE 115259 - Added the Flush Document Cache and Flush Stylesheet Cache steps and their associated flush-document-cache and flush-stylesheet-cache targets.
